author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is for the introduction of Tracking Jets Producer , which clusters L1 tracks that are matched with Gen particles to create jets. The clustering algorithm that was used is the "FastJet". Essentially, is the optimal performance we can get in L1 jets, and be viewed as the ceiling for the phase2 track jet algo. This can be used in the future to assess performance of new algo / Fast Jet. More can be found in the GTT presentation: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1028525/contributions/4324252/attachments/2228034/3774593/Performance_TrkJet.pdf

#### PR validation:

Rebase of https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/914

Rebase of https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/914
title: L1T Phase-2: add tracking jets
